service.name: automated-annotation
service.description: Automated annotation service using LangChain for knowledge extraction and text annotation

endpoints.description: Classify bag model using vector-based similarity search (image vector from image_id)

body.image_id: string (required) - Processing/Image ID stored in the image-processing DynamoDB table
body.brand: string (required) - Brand namespace for Pinecone (e.g., 'jacquemus'). Uses 7 nearest neighbors by default
body.image_url: string (optional) - Reference image URL included for client context

endpoints.description: Classify a bag property (type, material, colour, etc.) using the DSL orchestrator

body.image_url: string (required) - Image URL used by the classifier
body.text_dump: string (required) - Textual description/context used for classification
body.brand: string (optional) - Brand context passed to the classifier
body.resolve_names: boolean (optional) - Include resolved names in response

endpoints.description: Health check endpoint for the automated annotation service
